title: Handy Man Braum (Skin Suggestion)
body:
As a Support Main (However few and far-between we may be), I believe that sometimes the champions built for our role can be a little over looked sometimes. Not in the sense of statistical balances, reworks, buffs, and nerfs but more so in regards to attention and creativity. Im talking about SKINS!

Basically I just want riot to make a Handy Man Braum skin. He'd look kinda similar to Lumberjack Sion with the Red Flannel shirt and some blue jeans on the bottom and a tool belt thrown in for good measure, BUT HE'D CARRY A DOOR! Like a wooden front door you'd see on a suburban house.

In regards to his abilities:
Q - A Hammer is thrown out from the door
W - ...(I couldn't think of any way to change or improve that animation)
E - Instead of a blue translucent wall he could construct a picket fence in front of him to block incoming damage
R - Braum throws down his red metal tool box and tools come flying out around him and in front knocking everyone up!

his taunts could include him constructing things like a playground or a dog house. Maybe even carting dirt in a wheel barrow? I definitely believe that his recall animation should be him constructing a door frame and then fitting his door that he carries, into the frame and then walking through it like a portal back to the fountain.

Anyway, Let me know what you think of the skin idea, post some suggestions and lets make this skin happen!!

replies.body:
I like it.
I'd like to see this with unique vocals as well.
Give him the "home improvement/Tim the toolman Taylor" signature grunt as his laugh, etc.

As a Braum main myself, I would love to see a skin like or similar to this. At the moment I use Dragon Slayer Braum and is getting a little old because most of the taunts, voice lines are the same and his recall is pretty bland. A skin like this would be absolutely amazing, but don't change the voice lines too much (Braums voice lines are too inspiring to change), maybe just the taunt voice lines. A skin I would defiantly purchase.{{champion:201}}
Great suggestion JDJ as I prefer the funny/comic humour skins this would really appeal to a heap of people id say.

I also think a FMA Major Armstrong style Braum skin would be awesome.
Copyright hasn't stopped them up until now.
